summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to proceed with the design and construction of signal, street and sidewalk improvements (West Campus Garage - Street Improvements) made necessary by the University of Washington's West Campus Parking Garage Project; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute interlocal agreements with the University of Washington for payment of City costs relating to the Project; authorizing the acceptance, deposit and appropriation of the funds to be received; making an increase of expenditure allowances in the 1993 Budget of the Engineering Department; and authorizing the hiring of consultants and proceeding with construction.
